National Hospital Association - USA

You are here

    iAssure International Technologies / ECM Solutions / National Hospital Association - USA
  •   0

Description

  • A B2B application providing a community based platform to connect various   healthcare professionals with the Healthcare Vendors
  •  A brilliant way for the vendors to establish connections with health care   professionals to promote their products
  •  Interactive UI provides a soothing user experience
  •  Involves integration with LinkedIn to facilitate connections between the users
